title: Stainless Steel Appliances, A/C, Parking, Renovated 1+1 in Glendale
posting_body: Welcome home to Flats on Elk!
Our active community is nestled in Glendale, California.
We are just minutes from the Museum of Neon Art.
Glendale is also home to Brand Park, which has some of the best hiking and bike trails.
Conveniently located throughout the city are some of the finest shopping venues and local eateries.
We offer chic apartment living at an affordable rate.
With spacious one and two bedroom floor plans to choose from, finding the right apartment home to fit your needs has never been easier.
Quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, and hardwood flooring come standard in all our apartments.
To help make cooking a breeze, a well equipped kitchen is at your disposal complete with microwave, refrigerator and dishwasher.
We strive to provide our residents a lifestyle of comfort and convenience.
Flats on Elk is a newly renovated apartment community.
We pride ourselves on our contemporary and modern designs.
Our apartment community is proud to feature beautifully landscaped grounds.
We want you to feel at home, that is why we allow pets, because we know they are part of your family as well.
To make your life easier we have made covered parking available to all our residents.
Call or come by today and see why flats on Elk is the place you want to call home.
- Furnished Homes and Corporate Housing Available by Request (In Select Units)
- Pets Welcome with an Additional Deposit.
Pricing and availability are subject to change based on your preferred move in date and lease term.
Photos may not be of exact unit.
